messages.title: Change
messages.content: Chris White - Change that works for you

messages.title: Backing The NHS
messages.content: Chris White and the Conservatives will always back our NHS.

messages.title: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery
messages.content: Labour's rise in National Insurance is a tax on jobs and will kill the recovery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris White supports the National Health Service and believes in backing the NHS to improve healthcare services.
Chris White is involved in campaigns to say no to regional spatial strategy and protect green gap.
Chris White opposes Labour's rise in National Insurance, viewing it as a tax on jobs that will harm economic recovery.

issues.economy: Opposition to Labour's proposed National Insurance rise as harmful to job creation and economic recovery.
issues.environment: Opposition to regional spatial strategy and support for protecting green gaps.
issues.health: Chris White and the Conservatives back the NHS for healthcare improvements.

housing.content: Campaigns to protect green gap and oppose the regional spatial strategy.

quotes.text: Chris White - Change that works for you

images.caption: Chris White with various community members and involved in different campaigns.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains several images of Chris White engaging in community activities and campaigns, emphasizing his involvement with local issues and his support for public services such as the NHS.
